Course.Name: Multimedia Systems
Course.Description: This course presents the broad field of multimedia systems. Topics include the digital interactive multimedia, creation of multimedia, and various issues involving technology, design and effectiveness of multimedia applications. Students will have the opportunity to learn programming techniques for integrating video, sound, animation and graphics for multimedia systems.
Course.Prerequisite: Undergraduate level CSCI 3333/CMPE 3333 with a minimum grade of D or consent of instructor.
Course.Restrictions: dnu-MED in Educational Admin, MPA in Public Administration, Bus. Admin -Accelerated online, and not in English Language Institute level
Course.Course-attributes: Degree Elective, CS Instruction Fee - HU
